product.title: White Palace with Fountain Nano Building Blocks
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Conquer this amazing building project

    Take on the challenge and display an elegant palace featuring white walls, navy roof tiles, gold accents, and a large fountain. Not only is this a rewarding project but we know you'll enjoy every second of the building process. If you love architecture and buildings, then you will definitely love this building set.

    ✨ Measurements: about 6x11x14in / 15x27x37cm
    ✨ Contains over 2710+ pieces 
    ✨ Compatible with nano building blocks
    ✨ Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm) 
    ✨ Available with or without LED lights
    ✨ Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    Built for adults and children

    Our building blocks are designed with advanced engineering features providing a unique building experience for all building block fans. We always provide an easy-to-follow instruction booklet for you to build with no hassle.

    Nano Blocks: Smaller than the micro and traditional building block.

    Features

    ✨ 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    ✨ Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    ✨ Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    ✨ High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along.

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.

     

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    Are these compatible with other leading brands? Yes, these are nano blocks so they are compatible with leading nano blocks. 


    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to over 300 countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
